mapper.insert: insert into odc.program (progName, progBigTitle, progSmallTitle, progContent, progLocation, progLikeCount, userNumber, uploadLocation) values (#{progName}, #{progBigTitle}, #{progSmallTitle}, #{progContent}, #{progLocation}, #{progLikeCount}, #{userNumber}, #{uploadLocation})
mapper.select: select count(*) from odc.program where progSeq > 0
